name: For Aleksei
description:
Last month was my friend's 22nd birthday so I drew him this landscape of his home as a gift. Kai also wrote some really beautiful words that he let me arrange around the world. After gifting it, my friend said it would be nice to share so here it is! With the piece, I wanted to remind him that home is out there and it will always be waiting for him.

Please enjoy and remember to cherish your friends!
